scripts.vue-zip: npm run _check-vue-win-module && node createModuleZip ../frameworks/js/vue node_modules win
scripts.commit: npm run _set-git-user && git add --all && git commit -m `node ./version` && git push origin master && npm run _release
scripts._set-git-user: git config --local user.name 'gorin' && git config --local user.email 'gorin@example.com'
